title: Bounding Box Schema
description: Bounding box schema. A bounding box is determined by its top left corner, width and height. This is stored in a 4-tuple [left, top, width, height].

items.title: left
items.description: The x coordinates of the top left corner of the bounding box. Units are relative to the image width.

items.title: top
items.description: The y coordinates of the top left corner of the bounding box. Units are relative to the image height.

items.title: width
items.description: The width of the bounding box. Units are relative to the image width.

items.title: height
items.description: The height of the bounding box. Units are relative to the image height.
